content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK     'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/bing_covid-19_data/latest/bing_covid-19_data.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS [result];

SELECT
    SUM(deaths) as TotalDeaths, MONTH(updated) as Months
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK     'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/bing_covid-19_data/latest/bing_covid-19_data.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS [result]
group By MONTH(updated)   
Order by MONTH(updated) ASC
